document_data.name: Newf
document_data.mainbody: '''''I'se th' b'y that Builds the Boat''''' was a sea shanty from the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Contents:
{{quote|''I'se th' b'y that builds the boat,
And I'se th' b'y who sails 'er,
And I'se th' b'y that catches th fish,
And brings 'em home to Liza!''|Pirate Newf}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''I'se th' b'y that Builds the Boat'' was sang at the [[Vulgar Monkey]], a dockside tavern on the island of [[Brynnlaw]] in the [[Nelanther Isles]]. The shanty was a favorite of [[Newf|Pirate Newf]]'s.
